categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode I Adventures Game Books

nodes.text: Episode I Adventures Game Book 2: The Bartokk Assassins
Episode I Adventures Game Book 2: The Bartokk Assassins was the second installment of Star Wars Episode I Adventures game books.
A band of Bartokk assassins is in possession of many unusual Trade Federation starfighters.
They have also kidnapped an innocent child.
The Bartokks will stop at nothing to destroy you.
May the Force be with you.
